```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(incidence)
```

## Report on the ongoing Ebola outbreak in Uganda, 2019/2020
Here is an incidence curve of the reported cases so far:

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ebola_dat <- read_csv(file = '../data/ebola_1.csv')
ebola_inc <- incidence(ebola_dat$onsetDate, groups = ebola_dat$status)
plot(ebola_inc, xlab = 'Date of onset')
```
